text: Barton Fink is a 1991 American drama movie. The movie is set in 1941 in Los Angeles. The title character is enjoying success of his first Broadway play. Barton Fink is played by John Turturro. The movie got very positive reviews, but it did not make much money. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1991 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by the Coen brothers
title: Barton Fink
